name: Snail Mail (itch) (beanssbm)
description:
Deliver letters as a snail using only two buttons to move only two directions.

The United Game Jam is my second game jam. I used Unity to write it. Here's a pastebin to my sources on sounds/art: https://pastebin.com/B7azyPWJ

And here's my code: https://github.com/BenjaminMassey/SnailMail
